item.title: Trump announces U.S. stake in Intel
item.description: President Trump announced Friday that the government had reached a deal to secure a 10% stake in technology company Intel.

item.title: Texas Gov. Abbott celebrates passage of 'One Big Beautiful' redistricting map
item.description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott vowed to sign the new congressional map after it was approved just hours earlier by the state Senate.
